languages.text: Видя в Вольном Торговце истинн{mf|ого|ую} чемпион{mf|а|ку} Темных богов, банда Несущих Слово обосновалась во владениях фон Валанциусов. Тысячи сходящих с ума писарей скребли стилусами по инфопластинам, записывая их нечестивое учение, тысячи воксов транслировали их страшные проповеди всему Простору.
languages.translation_comment:
игрок демонпринц или уралон компаньон
не присягнул ктану

languages.text: Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Видя в Вольном Торговце истинн{mf|ого|ую} чемпион{mf|а|ку} Темных богов, банда Несущих Слово обосновалась во владениях фон Валанциусов. Тысячи сходящих с ума писарей скребли стилусами по инфопластинам, записывая их нечестивое учение, тысячи воксов транслировали их страшные проповеди всему Простору.

traits.locale_text: Seeing in the Rogue Trader the true champion of the Dark Gods, the Word Bearers took root in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scraped on the data-slates, slowly losing their minds, and putting down the words of their unholy teaching. Thousands of voxes broadcasted their dreadful sermons across the entire Expanse.

Seeing in the Rogue Trader the true champion of the Dark Gods, the Word Bearers took root in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scraped on the data-slates, slowly losing their minds, and putting down the words of their unholy teaching. Thousands of voxes broadcasted their dreadful sermons across the entire Expanse.

Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scraped on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they put down the words of their unholy teaching. Thousands of voxes broadcast their hideous sermons across the entire Expanse.

Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scraped on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they put down the words of their unholy teaching. Thousands of voxes broadcast their hideous sermons across the entire Expanse.

Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

languages.text: 怀言者目睹了行商浪人成为黑暗诸神的真正勇士，在冯·瓦兰修斯的领地之中建立了自己的力量。成千上万书记员在数据板上奋笔疾书，传播邪恶教义的同时也逐渐失去了理智。成千上万的音阵装置在整个科罗努斯扩区中播放着怀言者可怕的布道。
languages.original_text: Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 怀言者目睹了行商浪人成为黑暗诸神的真正勇士之后，冯·瓦兰修斯的领地中建立了自己的力量。成千上万书记员在数据板上奋笔疾书，书写邪恶教义的同时，也逐渐失去了理智。成千上万的音阵装置在整个科罗努斯扩区中播放着他们可怕的布道。

languages.text: Die Word Bearers sahen {mf|im Freihändler|in der Freihändlerin} einen wahren Streiter der Dunklen Götter und ließen sich im Reich derer von Valancius nieder. Tausende von Schreibern kratzten auf Datablocks herum und verloren langsam den Verstand, während sie die Worte unheiliger Lehren festhielten. Tausende von Vox-Systemen übertrugen die schändlichen Predigten der Word Bearers in die gesamte Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Die Word Bearers sahen {mf|im Freihändler|in der Freihändlerin} einen wahren Streiter der Dunklen Götter und ließen sich im Reich derer von Valancius nieder. Tausende von Schreibern kratzten auf Datablocks herum und verloren langsam den Verstand, während sie die Worte ihrer unheiligen Lehre festhielten. Tausende von Vox-Systemen übertrugen ihre schändlichen Predigten in der gesamten Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Voyant dans {mf|le libre-marchand un vrai champion|la libre-marchande une vraie championne} des Dieux Sombres, les Word Bearers s'établirent dans le domaine des von Valancius. Des milliers de scribes sombrèrent peu à peu dans la folie à force de passer leur temps à saisir leurs enseignements impies sur des plaques de données, tandis que des milliers de vox diffusaient les sermons hideux des Word Bearers dans toutes les Étendues.
languages.original_text: Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Voyant dans {mf|le libre-marchand un vrai champion|la libre-marchande une vraie championne} des Dieux Sombres, les Word Bearers s'établirent dans le domaine des von Valancius. Des milliers de scribes sombrèrent peu à peu dans la folie à force de passer leur temps à saisir leurs enseignements impies sur des plaques de données, tandis que des milliers de vox diffusaient leurs sermons hideux dans toutes les Étendues.

languages.text: Al reconocer en {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente a un{mf||a} auténtic{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona} de los Dioses Oscuros, los Portadores de la Palabra se establecieron en los territorios de los von Valancius. Miles de escribas se volvieron locos grabando las palabras profanas de sus enseñanzas en tablillas de datos, y miles de vocos retransmitieron los aterradores sermones de los Portadores de la Palabra por la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Al reconocer en {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente a un{mf||a} auténtic{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona} de los Dioses Oscuros, los Portadores de la Palabra se establecieron en los territorios de los von Valancius. Miles de escribas se volvieron locos grabando las palabras profanas de sus enseñanzas en tablillas de datos. Miles de vocos retransmitieron sus aterradores sermones por toda la Extensión.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の中に暗黒神の真の覇者を見いだし、ワードベアラーたちはフォン・ヴァランシウスの領地に身を移した。何千人もの書記がデータスレートに彼らの邪悪な教えの言葉を書き記すうちに、徐々に正気を失っていった。何千ものヴォクスが、ワードベアラーの忌まわしい説教をエクスパンス全体に放送した。
languages.original_text: Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の中に暗黒神の真の覇者を見いだし、ワードベアラーたちはフォン・ヴァランシウスの領地に身を移した。何千人もの書記がデータスレートに彼らの邪悪な教えの言葉を書き記すうちに、徐々に正気を失っていった。何千ものヴォクスが、ワードベアラーの忌まわしい説教をエクスパンス全体に放送した。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in Kara Tanrıların gerçek bir müdafisi olduğunu gören Vahyedenler, von Valancius topraklarına yerleşti. Databelaları tırmalayan binlerce kâtip, din dışı öğretilerin kelamlarını kaydederken yavaş yavaş aklını yitirdi ve Vahyedenlerin korkunç vaazları, binlerce voks ile Enginlik'in dört bir yanında yayımlandı.
languages.original_text: Seeing a true champion of the Dark Gods in the Rogue Trader, the Word Bearers established themselves in the von Valancius demesne. Thousands of scribes scratched away on data-slates, slowly losing their minds as they recorded the words of unholy teachings, and thousands of voxes broadcast the Word Bearers' hideous sermons across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in Karanlık Tanrıların gerçek bir şampiyonu olduğunu gören Vahyedenler, von Valancius malikânesine yerleştiler. Databelaları tırmalayan binlerce kâtip, din dışı öğretilerin kelamlarını kaydederken yavaş yavaş aklını yitirdi ve Vahyedenlerin korkunç vaazları, binlerce voks ile Enginlik'in dört bir yanında yayınlandı.

languages.translation_comment:
игрок демонпринц или уралон компаньон
не присягнул ктану
